mapper.insert: insert into sys_stop_taking_notice( tid, title, content, signature, notice_time, begin_time, end_time, create_time,update_time,create_by,update_by ) values ( #{tid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{signature}, #{beginTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, sysdate(),sysdate(),#{createBy},#{createBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT sstn.id AS id, sstn.tid AS tid, sstn.title as title, sstn.content as content, sstn.signature as signature, sstn.notice_time as noticeTime, sstn.begin_time as beginTime, sstn.end_time as endTime, sstn.create_time AS createTime, sstn.update_time AS updateTime, sstn.create_by AS createBy from sys_stop_taking_notice sstn WHERE tid = #{tid}
